item.description:
Hello Canucks,

For January's meetup we'll be heading to Central square to have dinner and/or drinks at the Tavern in the Square. If you are new to the group please come out and meet some new friends in Boston.

Cheers,

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting by the bar

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian January Meetup
